pages.text:
Play
A GREAT PLACE TO LIVE
About Us
Heritage Springs is an impressive 55+ gated and deed-restricted community encompassing 875 scenic acres in highly-desirable Trinity, Florida.
Our community's 1,337 homes are surrounded by ponds and conservation areas, a stunning golf course, and fascinating wildlife. Living in Heritage Springs gives you the feeling of being on vacation year-round. Our houses include attached villas, detached villas, and larger estate homes, so there are homes to fit every lifestyle.
People from different regions of the country choose Heritage Springs for a variety of reasons, including our mild winters, active lifestyle, outstanding amenities, strong financials, and easy access to Tampa and Tampa International Airport.
All homeowners are ‘equity members’ in the Heritage Springs Community Association, and share in the enjoyment of our beautiful amenities.
20,600 Square Foot Clubhouse
18-Hole Championship Golf Course
Golf Pro Shop
Har-Tru Tennis Courts
Heated Pool and Spa
Fitness Center
Performing Arts Center
Fountain Vue Restaurant and Sports Lounge
Outdoor Pavilion with Bar-B-Q Grills and Picnic Seating
We have a professional onsite staff that helps our members take full advantage of all that our community has to offer.
Concierge Desk:
(
member assistance and support services
)
PGA Professionals:
(
golf lessons and instruction
)
Lifestyle Director:
(
social activities and event planning
)
Manned Gatehouse:
(
provides 24/7 access control
)
Our clubhouse is the heart of our community where meetings, planned entertainment, and a variety of activities take place. There is a great deal to choose from including:
Cards
Mahjong
Billiards
Bingo
Library: (Books, and Computers with Internet Access)
Arts & Crafts: (Painting, Quilting, Ceramics, Jewelry Making, and more)
Clubs: (Photography, Drama, Book, Garden, Veterans, and more)
Dance and Exercise Classes
Performing Arts Center: (Live Bands, Shows, Planned Member Events)
We take pride in our beautiful community with its tree-lined streets and well-maintained grounds. Heritage Springs is regarded as one of the best values in the Tampa Bay area.
Phone
727-372-5411
Address
HERITAGE SPRINGS COMMUNITY ASSOCIATION, INC.
11345 Robert Trent Jones Parkway
Trinity, Florida 34655
© 2025  Heritage Springs Community. All Rights Reserved.
Powered by Jonas Club Software

Play
THE TRINITY AREA
Heritage Springs is one of more than a dozen planned communities in Trinity, Florida. It's located in southwest Pasco County, bordering Pinellas and Hillsborough Counties, and is only a 35 minute drive from Tampa.
Our properties include attached villas, detached villas, and estate homes
(shown)
, that sell in the mid-$300K to mid-$600K range. When you purchase a home in Heritage Springs, you also have access to a wide variety of resort-quality amenities. With 1,337 homes and nearly 2,500 residents, we are the largest community in Trinity.
The population of Trinity is 18,191, and the average annual household income is $112,298. As part of the $1.5 billion master-planned community of Trinity, Heritage Springs residents are in close proximity to great shopping, popular restaurants, and excellent medical facilities. Trinity is a safe, highly-desirable community in the Tampa Bay area.
Welcome to Trinity Website
There is no shortage of quality medical care in the Trinity area. The HCA Florida Trinity Hospital, Trinity Outpatient Center, and Suncoast Urgent Care are just minutes from Heritage Springs. In addition, Quest Diagnostics, Tower Radiology, and numerous excellent medical and dental practices are located within a 15-minute drive from our gates.
Trinity Community Park
, with its pickle ball courts, dog runs, children’s play area, and pond-view walking path, sits adjacent to Heritage Springs. The park is maintained by the
Trinity Communities Master Association (TCMA)
, and Heritage Springs is the largest member of the association.
Phone
727-372-5411
Address
HERITAGE SPRINGS COMMUNITY ASSOCIATION, INC.
11345 Robert Trent Jones Parkway
Trinity, Florida 34655
© 2025  Heritage Springs Community. All Rights Reserved.
Powered by Jonas Club Software

Play
CONTACT INFORMATION
Heritage Springs Community Association, Inc.
11345 Robert Trent Jones Parkway
Trinity, FL. 34655
Administration & Clubhouse
Our Administrative Office is located inside our clubhouse at:
11345 Robert Trent Jones Parkway, Trinity Florida 34655
. It is open from
9:00 AM - 5:00 PM (Eastern Time)
, Monday thru Friday.
Questions?
If you would like additional information, please contact our Administrative Office during our normal business hours at:
(727) 372 - 5411
. You can also email us at:
[email protected]
Home Sales/Visitations
Our homes are resales, so we highly recommend that you contact a local realtor before trying to visit Heritage Springs. Unaccompanied visitors without an appointment may have difficulty gaining access to our community.
Golf Pro Shop
If you have questions about our golf programs, please contact our golf personnel from
6:00 AM - 5:00 PM (Eastern Time)
at:
(727) 372 - 5281
.
IMPORTANT INFORMATION
Heritage Springs has three entrances. Two of them are 'Resident Only' gates that require a bar code for access. Visitors can ONLY enter the community via our manned gatehouse located at:
11130 Robert Trent Jones Parkway
(on the west side of the community). You can use the gatehouse address for your GPS.
Driving Directions
From the East:
From I-75, or Veterans Expressway/Suncoast Parkway, take State Route 54 west to Trinity Boulevard. Turn left at the light and proceed to Tamarind Boulevard. Turn left at the light and turn left again on Robert Trent Jones Parkway. Proceed to the Heritage Springs gated entrance.
From the West:
From U.S. 19, proceed east on State Route 54. Turn right on Little Road. Little Road crosses Trinity Boulevard and becomes Robert Trent Jones Parkway. Proceed to the Heritage Springs gated entrance.
From the North:
Take Little Road south. Little Road crosses Trinity Boulevard and becomes Robert Trent Jones Parkway. Proceed to the Heritage Springs gated entrance.
From the South:
Take East Lake Road north to Trinity Boulevard. Turn right and proceed to Little Road/Robert Trent Jones Parkway. Turn right on to Robert Trent Jones Parkway and proceed to the Heritage Springs gated entrance.
Phone
727-372-5411
Address
HERITAGE SPRINGS COMMUNITY ASSOCIATION, INC.
11345 Robert Trent Jones Parkway
Trinity, Florida 34655
© 2025  Heritage Springs Community. All Rights Reserved.
Powered by Jonas Club Software

ABOUT THE TAMPA AREA
Heritage Springs is located approximately 30 miles North of Tampa Florida, close to Florida’s scenic Gulf Coast. Tampa International Airport (TIA) is an easy 35 minute drive via the Suncoast Parkway. The cities of Tampa and St. Petersburg are popular vacation destinations, and the Tampa Bay area has so much to offer that it’s impossible to include everything. Below are several outstanding venues that are less than an hour away.
BUSCH GARDENS: Tampa
(
an exceptional world-class theme park
)
INTERNATIONAL PLAZA:
Tampa
(
distinctive shopping and dining
)
PORT of TAMPA:
(
a popular departure point for cruise ships
)
HARDROCK HOTEL & CASINO:
Tampa
(
a touch of Las Vegas near home
)
STRAZ CENTER: Tampa
(
professional theatrical presentations
)
RUTH ECKERD HALL:
Clearwater
(
top-name entertainment
)
MAHAFFEY THEATER:
St. Petersburg
(
shows and concerts
)
LOWRY PARK ZOO:
Tampa
(
a fun family destination
)
FLORIDA AQUARIUM: Tampa
(
a great place for all ages
)
SPONGE DOCKS:
Tarpon Springs
(a
popular local tourist location
)
If you are willing to travel beyond the Tampa Bay area, there are lots of other exciting places to add to your ‘to-do’ list.
EPCOT, DISNEY WORLD, SEA WORLD, UNIVERSAL: Orlando
KENNEDY SPACE CENTER/CAPE CANAVERAL: Merritt Island
ST. AUGUSTINE
(America's oldest historic city, founded in 1595)
If you enjoy professional sports, there's plenty to keep you busy year-round.
TAMPA BAY RAYS BASEBALL:
Tropicana Field
TAMPA BAY BUCCANEERS FOOTBALL:
Raymond James Stadium
TAMPA BAY LIGHTNING HOCKEY:
Amalie Arena
TAMPA BAY ROWDIES SOCCER:
Al Lang Stadium
ORLANDO MAGIC BASKETBALL:
Kia Center, Orlando (
2 hr. drive
)
NASCAR:
Daytona International Speedway, Daytona Beach (
3 hr. drive
)
The Tampa Bay area is also the Spring Training home for the New York Yankees, Toronto Blue Jays, and Philadelphia Phillies.
Our area also features excellent museums, outstanding parks, and pristine white sand beaches. Clearwater Beach is on the beautiful Gulf of Mexico, and is located less than an hour from Trinity. This premier beach is continually ranked as one of the top beaches in the United States.
Phone
727-372-5411
Address
HERITAGE SPRINGS COMMUNITY ASSOCIATION, INC.
11345 Robert Trent Jones Parkway
Trinity, Florida 34655
